heading: 1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (Retail
text_raw:
1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (Retail 
Charges for Regulated Intra-EU Communications) (Amendment) Regulations
text_norm: 1 (1) regulation may cited european union (retail charge regulated intra-eu communications) (amendment) regulation

title: Article 50 of Regulation (EU) 2018/1971 of the European Parliament and of the
heading: (2) These Regulations shall come into operation on 9 June 2023.
text_raw:
2023. 

(2) These Regulations shall come into operation on 9 June 2023.

title: Article 50 of Regulation (EU) 2018/1971 of the European Parliament and of the
heading: 2. The European Union (Retail Charges for Regulated Intra-EU
text_raw:
2. The European Union (Retail Charges for Regulated Intra-EU 

Communications) Regulations 2020 (S.I. No. 668 of 2020) are amended by - 

(a) 

the substitution of the following Regulation for Regulation 4: 

“4. An undertaking shall comply with its obligations under 
Article 5a of the EU Regulation.”, and 

(b) 

the deletion of Regulations 5 and 6(8). 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

6 June, 2023. 

EAMON RYAN, 

Minister for the Environment, Climate and 
Communications. 

1 OJ No. L310, 26.11.2015, p.1 
2 OJ No. L 321, 17.12.2018, p. 1 
3 OJ No. L321, 17.12.2018, p.36 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 13th June, 2023. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [301] 3
